attributes.action: Give CAMHS around the country more funding - 2 year waiting lists are NOT okay.
attributes.additional_details:
Evidence:
Personal experience in CAMHS 

Kids in Crisis Documentary on BBC

https://www.google.com/amp/s/amp.theguardian.com/society/2018/jun/25/mental-health-services-young-nhs-silent-catastrophe-survey-chronic-underfunding

https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.bbc.co.uk/news/amp/health-45607313
attributes.background: The fact that many CAMHS services have 18 to 24 month waiting lists is not OK. Only children who are a risk to themselves are let in. ALL children with mental health issues should have treatement within 4 weeks of referral. Please sign this so CAMHS gets more funding and this issue nationwide ends.
